fields.description: Air quality is considered satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk
fields.name: Good

fields.description: Air quality is acceptable; however, for some pollutants there may be a moderate health concern for a very small number of people who are unusually sensitive to air pollution.
fields.name: Moderate

fields.description: Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects. The general public is not likely to be affected.
fields.name: Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups

fields.description: Everyone may begin to experience health effects; members of sensitive groups may experience more serious health effects.
fields.name: Unhealthy

fields.description: Health alert: everyone may experience more serious health effects
fields.name: Very unhealthy

fields.description: Health warnings of emergency conditions. The entire population is more likely to be affected.
fields.name: Hazardous
